name: Attuned_Expedient_Reinforcement_F
display_help: UNIQUE -- No more than 1 enhancement of this type may be slotted by a character. Grants you a 20' radius aura which increases your Henchmen's Damage Resistance to all but psionics by 10%.
power_display_names: Expedient Reinforcement: Resist Bonus Aura for Pets
